So you just want to launch a minimal Shopify website, but it looks overwhelming and you don’t know where to start? I’m here to help you out by showing you how to make a minimalist Shopify theme. After watching this step-by-step Shopify website design tutorial, you’ll be able to create a Shopify website from scratch.
